post.content:
Our client, a Toronto-based company specializing in social media analytics products, is currently looking for a Software Engineer to join their development team.
Background: The position will involve working mostly on the system back-end for an analytics platform, writing code in Java and handling terabytes of raw text data. However, the client also wants someone with front-end social media experience, as they provide many REST-based web services to clients. Qualifications: Expertise in Java (minimum 2 years of experience) Knowledgeable about: System performance Server side development (including MySQL, XML) Key-value stores (eg, MongoDB, Lucene) Multi-threaded programming Web development experience (including JSP, Javascript, HTML/CSS, Apache Tomcat, API mashups used in social media websites) Undergraduate degree in Computer Science MSc or PhD is an asset Strong mathematical and algorithmic background Duration: Permanent Location: Downtown Toronto
If you are interested in the position send me an updated resume. Also, consider recommending someone else for the position as well.
Regards,
Bhanwar Dhanoa Recruiter SRA Staffing Solutions 416-296-1772 ext. 2004
